Class StudentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Control.StudentController

  • public class StudentController
extends java.lang.Object
    Student Controller class handles student functions and calls to the data file

    2017-04-01
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ameen, Ashiq, Will, Reuben, Waqas

      • readAllStudents

        public static java.util.ArrayList readAllStudents(java.lang.String filename)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        This method reads all the students
        Parameters:
        filename - of where the students should be read from
        Returns:
        An arraylist with student objects in it
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws an exception when there is a problem reading contents

        Parameters:
        filename - where the contents should be written onto
        al - is the List of contents
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an issue building the string

      • deleteStudent

        public boolean deleteStudent(java.lang.String file,
                             java.lang.String matriculationNumber)
        This method deletes the student from a text file
        Parameters:
        file - refers to the name of the file
        matriculationNumber - refers to Student's matric number
        Returns:
        True if the deletion is successful.False,if deletion is unsuccessful

        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file
        al - refers to a List of content
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown if an exception is thrown
